articles.description: Ed Husic and Anne Aly have become the first Muslim ministers in Australia’s history in a move that’s been hailed as a signal to the world about an improvement in the representation of politics in the country.
articles.content: Ed Husic and Anne Aly have become the first people of the Muslim faith sworn into the federal ministry.
